Detailed Description

This class can layout Simulink elements within a System.

We mean layout in the sense of position in the screen.

The layout algorithm starts from the top-left corner, addind inports, in a vertical row. Then systems are added in a horizontal row. Lastly, outpots are added in a vertical row.
